languages.text: "Виноват, Ваш высокобродие! Не мог знать, сведений не было! Знали бы, что так{mf|ого|ую} высок{mf|ого|ую} гост{mf|я|ью} ждем — сразу бы... со всем рвением!"

traits.locale_text: "Вы уж нас простите, Ваш высокобродие. Нам ведь приказ дали — мы выполняем, как можем!" {n} Судя по голосу, сержант напуган вашим недовольством.{/n}

languages.text: "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}! I couldn't have known, I wasn't notified! Had we known we were expecting such an eminent visitor, we would've... you know... at the double... with all due devotion!"
languages.original_text: "Виноват, Ваш высокобродие! Не мог знать, сведений не было! Знали бы, что так{mf|ого|ую} высок{mf|ого|ую} гост{mf|я|ью} ждем — сразу бы... со всем рвением!"

traits.locale_text: "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}! I couldn't have known, I wasn't notified! Had we known we were expecting such an eminent visitor, we would've... you know... on the double... with all due devotion!"

"Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}! I couldn't have known, I wasn't notified! Had we known we were expecting such an eminent visitor, we would've... you know... on the double... with all due devotion!"

"Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}! I couldn't have known, I wasn't notified! Had we known we were expecting such an eminent visitor, we would've... you know... at the double... with all due devotion!"

"Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}! I couldn't have known, I wasn't notified! Had we known we were expecting such an eminent visitor, we would've... you know... at the double... with all due devotion!"

"Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}! I couldn't have known, I wasn't notified! Had we known we were expecting such an eminent visitor, we would've... you know... at the double... with all due devotion!"

"Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}! I couldn't have known, I wasn't notified! Had we known we were expecting such an eminent visitor, we would've... you know... at the double... with all due devotion!"

languages.text: "Verzeiht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, {mf|Sir|Madam}! Ich hätte es nicht wissen können, mir wurde nichts gesagt! Hätten wir gewusst, dass wir solch hohen Besuch erwarten, hätten wir ... na ja ... im Laufschritt ... mit vollem Einsatz!"
languages.original_text: "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}! I couldn't have known, I wasn't notified! Had we known we were expecting such an eminent visitor, we would've... you know... at the double... with all due devotion!"

traits.locale_text: "Verzeiht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, {mf|Sir|Madam}! Ich hätte es nicht wissen können, mir wurde nichts gesagt! Hätten wir gewusst, dass wir solch hohen Besuch erwarten, hätten wir ... na ja ... im Laufschritt ... mit vollem Einsatz!"

languages.text: « Mes excuses, Votre Seigneurie ! Je ne pouvais pas le savoir, personne ne m'en a informé ! Si nous avions su que nous attendions une visite aussi éminente, nous aurions... enfin, vous voyez... au pas de charge... et avec toute la dévotion qui va bien ! »
languages.original_text: "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}! I couldn't have known, I wasn't notified! Had we known we were expecting such an eminent visitor, we would've... you know... at the double... with all due devotion!"

traits.locale_text: « Mes excuses, Votre Seigneurie ! Je ne pouvais pas le savoir, personne ne m'en a informé ! Si nous avions su que nous attendions une visite aussi éminente, nous aurions... enfin, vous voyez... au pas de charge... et avec toute la dévotion qui va bien ! »

languages.text: “对不起，大人！长官！我不知道，我并没有接到通知！如果我们早知道要迎接如此显赫的客人，我们就……您懂的……我们立刻……夹道欢迎！”
languages.original_text: "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}! I couldn't have known, I wasn't notified! Had we known we were expecting such an eminent visitor, we would've... you know... at the double... with all due devotion!"

traits.locale_text: “对不起，大人！长官！我不知道，我并没有接到通知！如果我们早知道要迎接如此显赫的客人，我们就……您懂的……我们立刻……夹道欢迎！”

languages.text: 「申し訳ありません、陛下！通知がなく、存じ上げておりませんでした！これほど高名な方がお越しとあれば…その…迅速に…誠心誠意お迎えしておりました！」
languages.original_text: "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}! I couldn't have known, I wasn't notified! Had we known we were expecting such an eminent visitor, we would've... you know... at the double... with all due devotion!"

traits.locale_text: 「申し訳ありません、陛下！通知がなく、存じ上げておりませんでした！このように高名な方がお越しとあれば…その…2倍で…誠心誠意お迎えしたはずです！」

languages.text: «Mis disculpas, mi{mf|lord|lady}! No podía saberlo, ¡no me avisaron! Si hubiéramos sabido que esperábamos una visita tan importante, lo habríamos hecho... ya sabe... al momento... ¡con toda devoción!».
languages.original_text: "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}! I couldn't have known, I wasn't notified! Had we known we were expecting such an eminent visitor, we would've... you know... at the double... with all due devotion!"

traits.locale_text: «Mis disculpas, mi{mf|lord|lady}!». No podía saberlo, ¡no me avisaron! Si hubiéramos sabido que esperábamos una visita tan importante, lo habríamos hecho... ya sabe... al momento... ¡con toda devoción!».

languages.text: "Özür dilerim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Bilemezdim, haber verilmedi! Sizin gibi seçkin bir ziyaretçinin geleceğini bilsek... Koşa koşa, tüm özverimizle... El pençe divan dururduk!"
languages.original_text: "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}! I couldn't have known, I wasn't notified! Had we known we were expecting such an eminent visitor, we would've... you know... at the double... with all due devotion!"

traits.locale_text: "Özür dilerim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Bilemezdim, haber verilmedi! Sizin gibi seçkin bir ziyaretçinin geleceğini bilsek... Koşa koşa, tüm özverimizle... El pençe divan dururduk!"
